评论详情: The pants are made of a fabric that feels soft, smooth, and luxurious to the touch.  Whether wearing when exercising or going out to shop - the fit is flattering!  These pants can be worn to any type of event - due to the quality of the material, the workmanship, and the style!  These pants are a timeless garment that needs to be added to every woman’s wardrobe!

评论概述: Love, love, love these yoga pants!!
评论详情: Highly recommend, these are opaque, super soft, high wasted and smooths out the tummy area but aren’t so tight that they are uncomfortable.  I’m 5’6” and these are long enough that I can wear Birks with them and my socks don’t show. They can be dressed up or down. You could totally get away with wearing these to work and not look like you’re wearing yoga pants.  I’ve already repurchased and planning on getting more!!

Am 5’6, 28” inseam 130ish lbs - bought the wide leg in white as a med 30” inseam as for some reason i though they might run short - they don’t, that’s fine - they are way more flattering tight rolled giving them a jogger/harem look so I’ll stuck with them. Also, the medium is loose enough on me that while i do have to pay some attention to underwear color, they are not see thru and don’t show any cellulite - a tighter fit might show more details there, but they are more opaque than many white pants I’ve tried while not being too thick for cooler summer weather (over about 85°F, no humidity & these are too thick for me.) Color is ever so slightly cream, almost a winter white - could pass as either white or winter white if that matters to you.  Second pair is another wide leg in “royal blue” M, 28” inseam and they *almost* touch the floor when I’m barefoot, the ideal break on flatter shoes IMHO. The color is a match to the photo, a navy blue - the pants are *not the brighter blue I associate with royal blue* at all, but I was willing to gamble, it’s a very nice true shade of navy, not too green, purple or grey in undertone. The darker color is slightly more flattering than the white, but not much.  If thigh slenderizing is high priority for you these wide leg ones are not your pants…they aren’t terribly unflattering, but they do me the least favors out of every pair of bottoms I own, old pajamas included, hence 4 instead of 5 stars.  The best part is they are wildly comfy and present much dressier than many of their equivalents in comfort! Easily yoga pants or even sleep wear. The medium loosely skims my frame without looking sloppy-baggy; would fit a small I’m sure, but I like wide leg pants to fit on the looser end. Front pockets are deep enough to for my phone with room left over. The exposed stitching of the flat seams make them extra comfortable, but knocks them out of being the true dress pants they could pass for with invisible stitching - they could easily pass as dressy enough for a great many occasions where jeans are a no-go for but aren’t up to par if you’re expected to be much dressier than business casual, purely because of the LEG seams, IMHO. (Am great with that and wish the waist seams were also flat, they’d be phenomenally comfy then - but if these folks offered an additional variety of these pants and sold them as the dressy version with all invisible stitching and leg seams in a more flattering position, these could easily be cocktail attire and definitely pass in any business setting.)

These wide-leg yoga pants are a dream! The fabric is incredibly soft and lightweight, making them perfect for yoga, lounging, or even running errands. The wide-leg design gives me plenty of freedom to move, and they’re so flattering on any body type. I ordered a size M, and while they fit well, I think a size S would have been a better fit for me. The waistband is stretchy but stays in place without digging in, which is a huge plus during workouts. They’re stylish enough to wear outside the house, and I’ve already gotten so many compliments on them. Highly recommend these if you’re looking for a mix of comfort and style!
Love the fit. Wide leg is stylish. Wide waist band doesn’t roll. Pockets are great. Well made - great fabric.

评论概述: Pros: look dressy. CON: length off, no compression.
评论详情: I am 5’4 and 140 pounds. I ordered this in black, grey and beige/khaki tan. I started with the black size medium short/petite but the length was too short even with flats. The wide leg doesn’t look right unless it’s almost touching the heel of your shoes. Next I ordered the medium (not short or tall just medium) in the grey & tan. I didn’t like the color of the lighter pair, the pockets were sewed differently and they were shorter inside and the fit in the crotch wasn’t the same as the grey. I also observed that the grey didn’t look as dressy as the black. Basic wide leg yoga pants. Trying on clothes from the closet I paired black pants with 3 different dress tops & a pashmina, both a Jean & leather jacket. All ok with flats albeit an inch short. But with boot, nope. boots (The pockets really help make them look more like regular pants, but only in the black. Not so much in the lighter colors.  Cons: 1. sizing is off. For 5’4 and a 29 length the petite length should be at least 1.5 inches longer.  2. no compression or tummy control. Absolutely zero—actually made my tummy a little more pronounced.  3. pucker at the pockets due to their placement. I’d go down to a small or xs but the pockets stick out already in a medium  4. price had already jumped from $25 to $35 in a week.  5. These are not worth $35 in my opinion being that they do nothing for tummy control. But for comfort, material and thickness these are 4 star. Just don’t expect these to replace shapewear. It won’t. If they go on sale again I will purchase another pair in maybe the darker blue but I will definitely get the Small Tall and see if that helps. Otherwise I’ll stick with the medium I’ve got. I NEVER wear heels and have short legs (my Jean size is a Lee size 8 short petite.) which means that the petite is ever too short for saddles and flat Dansko fur lined boots. The sandles looked a little better being just a cork type sole like a Birkenstock but less money. But I find them very comfortable, my husband thinks they are sexy and they are perfect for a long event (wedding/bsby shower/work) where your wanting to look dressed up without loosing comfort. I had a pair of compression tights on under these and they came off after 2 hours and I honestly felt like I was wearing pj bottoms. They haven’t wrinkled in the slightest, and I don’t typically “fold” or hand my pants after wearing. These were picked up after a week folded in half or in a ball on the floor and worn to church. They DO NOT NEED IRONED! Because they have some elastic I’d still recommend line drying and washing inside out in cold water in a mesh laundry bag. Elastic breaks down over time and I hang mine in the shower to dry in the winter when I don’t want to use the clothes line. Amazon sells these really cool hanger clips and I hang all my underwear and socks and everything else in the shower to dry.  Also, dirt wipes off easily and dog hair doesn’t stick to these.

Love these! They work great as dress pants. These are a little thicker than most yoga pants so they hold their shape and are super flattering and comfortable. I am 5ft tall, 165 and the XL petite is a perfect fit. Highly recommend!!
The pants are my favorite.  They are so comfortable and I they look professional.  The quality material is perfect strong but not to heavy.

I love these pants so much, I literally have 6 pairs. I'm 5 feet tall, size 12/14 and the petite large is perfect on me (although I would probably get away with a medium as well). They're super comfortable and versatile - I wear them at home, for going to the gym, to yoga, just out and about running errands, etc. Normally I wouldn't wear loungewear outside my home or the gym but these look so polished, they're good for wearing out normally as well. They're perfect for travel too - again, I'm not one to wear lounge clothes on flights because I think it's in poor taste to wear like sweatpants at the airport, but these look so elevated, they could just be trousers. And again, super comfy!! Honestly I have to stop myself from buying more cause I have enough lol.

Literally best pants I have. So comfortable like pajamas but classy enough to wear for business casual. I slept in these because I forgot to take them off. Cooling. Elastic. Good size pockets. Hugs the butt without making the thighs look thick at all. Slims you down. Hides the hips a bit. 10/10. I bought navey blue. Hides the ankles if you forget to shave. If you get a dark color, the wrinkles barely show. I could wear this for the rest of my life ngl. I'm 5'1 and I bought a small. I bought it for myself but makes a great gift. You can tell it was made by women. Very practical. If you don't trust comments usually, trust this one because I like never write reviews unless I realllly liked the product. Don't even second guess what you're buying just buy the pants theyr'e amazing.

I am 5’2, 133lbs Bought a small and medium petite because I wasn’t sure about size. I kept the small. The pants are cute And initially thought the leg was too wide. After trying on pants, width and length perfect . The material Is thin so there is not much too hold in Belly bulges but design helps hide it a bit. If they had More tummy Control would have given it 5 stars. I did not find that they ran large as in other reviews.

I decided to buy these because they were available in petite. I have really enjoyed wearing them. They fit great and are really comfortable. The length is perfect for me, and I wear them all of the time. They can be dressed up or dressed down. For reference, I’m 5’3, 130 lbs and I decided to get a small because I did not want the waist part being too tight on my stomach area.

I was pleasantly surprised by the fit and shape of these pants. They’re super comfortable and have a nice stretch while remaining form-flattering. I like that it’s easy to dress up or down. I took one star away because I’m being nit-picky about the visible seams, particularly the one running down the backside (right down butt-crack, for lack of better words).  I’m 5’3” with an athletic build and the Petite Small fit perfectly! It’s not often I find pants at the perfect length.

I purchased the L petite. Now I see why people pay over $30 for these pants (when they should be about $10 cheaper). It’s the fit. They look exceptionally good on and are particularly slimming. It’s the perfect wide leg. The waist is somewhat fitted, so if you’re unsure about sizing, definitely go up. I’ve already ordered my 2nd pair!

Like the high waist. Very comfortable pants. I wear them casual days. Not the fabric I would likely choose for dressing up. Could wear as workout but wide leg not as good as joggers for most machine exercises. Heavier Weight & fabric good quality. Not see through. Price point good.

I love these pants. I can wear them for just about any event. Perfect fit. I originally bought medium and loved the pants, but decided to get a small for my 3rd pair and live the fit even more. The fabric and high quality so they do not accent unwanted areas. Wear with a sweater and boots for a dinner out, wear to the gym, golfing, tennis, add a cute top for a social event. These are great pants! Tons of colors too

It is so hard to find wide leg yoga pants that fit me length wise as a petite girl. I weigh 163 and I am 5'2".  I ordered a large and I love everything about these pants!  These pants come in PETITE.AWESOME! They are so flattering, and I love the pockets and the soft feel of the fabric.  I just placed an order for 3 more pairs. I highly recommend these!

I love this! I’m 5’3” and I got the petite size S. It’s thick, comfortable and the length is perfect. I’m so glad it has pockets. I don’t like wearing tight pants, I think it’s kind of inappropriate, I prefer modest loose pants. I will definitely order more in different colors.

评论概述: Love these. The wide legs help camoflage ‘saddlebags’’
评论详情: Really like these, i had had Danskin relaxed wide leg yoga pants for yrs, that got real faded, I couldnt find any recently, so i tried these. Very nice quality, they are a little bit ‘dressier’ than my Danskins, if that makes sense  These run more snug than the relaxed fit XL danskins, im 5’8”, 160 lb, so i returned the XL of these new brand for XXL as i want to de-emphasize the saddlebags on outside of thighs. Love these and highly recommend.

They feel like my leggings but have a classy look! Match with a cute button up and you have yourself a work outfit. Throw on a tank top or baggy sweater and you have a chill day at home look. The taupe is classic, I'm grabbing more colors. I wear a medium in leggings so I bought a plain MEDIUM and it fits perfectly. I'm 5'5, 140lbs.

I wear a size 10 and bought the L.  They fit well.  I am 5'7" and they are long.  The top of the waist comes up quite high -- but they do fit and are QUITE comfortable.  I love the pocket and know I will wear these alot.

These Promover wide-leg pants are wonderful! I like that I can wear them to yoga, throw a sweater over my yoga shirt, and wear them to lunch without looking like I am in workout clothes. They fit well, are very comfortable, and the black and light khaki are great colors. I am eyeing a third pair.

Loved them so much, I've already ordered another. I'm 5'9, 160# and ordered L long. I was debating between the M & L but glad I went with the L since, as others have noted, the material is not super thick. The roomier fit lets things like the pocket outline and little lumpies around the hips & booty be less noticeable. Length is maybe a hair shorter than I'd prefer, but I'm all legs and the inseam measured right at 32" so I really can't complain. I ordered the burgundy and also as others have noted it is not as deep as it appears in the pictures, but I do still like the color. Went with taupe for the 2nd pair so we'll see how that goes.

The fit and length are perfect.  Well made and look nice enough to go out in. They will make a good travel pant.  My only comment - the static. It went away after I wore them for a while.  I live in Denver where because it is so dry, static happens.  Static Gard helps.

The fabric is soft but there is a hole.in the right pocket. I do not have time to return since I need to accommodate a brace post surgery. Rise is too high for my height (5’1”). I had to fold the waist over. Length can be 1/2” shorter. Quality and cut is fair.

I love these pants. I am short 5'2 and weigh about 135 pounds. I ordered the small, petite. I am going to order a couple more pairs. I prefer the darker colors. I ordered Navy Blue and they are the perfect length for a petite person. Love how they go over the tummy and they are very stylish.
These are nice. Comfortable and soft material. The style is not what I expected but they work for casual wear nicely which is the reason I don’t give them a 5 star.
Soft with a good fit. Pants length was good for me, but I am 5'4", so may be short for some.

Although you can wear these pants for a yoga class, I wear them for work as scrub pants. The material is thick but soft. They look good, they keep their shape after being watched many times. I have two pairs in black. Will have to try another colors too.

It's not easy to find pants that are long enough so I appreciate the tall option. They are definitely long enough and overall comfortable.  The material is soft and does not attract a lot of lint. They do not fall down easily.

These wide leg pants fit perfectly to size. I got a medium and I’m a size 10. They have a wide leg without looking big and baggy and are super soft and not see through.  I needed a wider leg,  comfortable pants after having a knee replacement, and these are great. I got them in two colors!
I was hesitant to purchase these pants. I’m very happy I did. They are extremely comfortable. J haven’t washed them yet but so far they are a great find!

I'm 5' 110ish lbs. I love these pants!! They're so cute and comfy, and I can get away with wearing them to work. With a thick, quality sweater, they look nice enough to pass for work pants. I loved then so much, I bought two, so I could get through the work week.

these are very comfortable pants that’s all that’s in. Needs to be said the fit is great and you can exercise in them very well. They I’ve had them for pretty much almost for a year and they filled up pretty well. I have no complaints. I really do like these pants and I absolutely recommend them. Thank you

评论详情: Love these pants! I am an Innkeeper and cook and clean for a B&B. I have a lot of skin sensitivities and these pants are not hot or itchy. Stretchy and surprisingly flattering. Highly recommend

评论概述: Great, ran a little shorter than expected
评论详情: These fit great.  I’m 5’4”, with curves, ~160.  I bought the large and the length was slightly shorter than expected.  Works great with flat sneakers but a little too short for platform sneakers.

I ordered size S which is usually my recommended size, but it was a little loose around the hip. Re-ordered in size XS and the fit is perfect, except the length, which I will need to shorten about 2 inches. The fabric thickness is medium. I got the black color, which is very opaque. I can see myself wearing this for lounging around at home, exercising, or for a casual outing, running errands etc... I like that it has pockets for my phone and keys. I like these pants a lot and will be wearing them often.
These pants fit like a dream. I get a lot of compliments when I wear them.
One pair were fine. Two pair were wrong length.

I hate leggings for myself as I am very much thicck in behind and thigh. These pants give me the comfort of a legging with a fabric density and looser fit that does not reveal every lump, bump and roll. I'm working up to owning a pair for every day of the week. Wash like a dream and haven't pulled or torn in over a year
My favorite yoga pants! I like how they fit around the waist but are loose-fitting around the legs. I'm comfortable wearing these shopping and can even golf in them.

Love the fabric and material hand of the pants ordered. They lay nice and smooth.  I plan to use them for travel.  They look dressier than yoga pants. I’m 5’3, 140 lbs and ordered medium. They fit perfect.

I’ve searched and searched for yoga pants in a petite length, and these are perfect. I’ve already ordered in two more colors! I’m 5’3” and the petite length hits right on top of my shoes. No shrinkage after washing. Fabric is thin, but not see through, and is just right for spring and fall or around the house in the winter. Pockets are deep enough to hold my phone. The waistband is wide, but like other reviewers mentioned, the very top of the waistband does roll a little bit. I wouldn’t go so far as to say these would pass for dress pants at work since work pants are typically a heavier weight fabric, but they can definitely be dressed up. These are exactly what I need for a day of mixed activities from exercising, running errands, working at my desk, doing household chores, playing with my kid… I can be comfortable doing it all.

评论概述: The pants are exactly as advertised
评论详情: Love the pants!!! I’ve lost a significant amount of weight and my legs have extra skin but the pants make my legs look flawless. The little stretch makes them comfortable to wear around the house or out.
The reviews said these were great yoga pants and they were RIGHT. These are my favorite pants. Dress down or up - they are so flattering. They are really great!

I'm 5'4" and usually wear a size small. These pants fit perfectly. The length is great for petite gals and they're super comfortable. I got them in black and can even dress them up for work with a sweater and sneakers! Giving 4 stars because they have pilled a bit since putting them through the wash a few times. Would recommend and I plan on purchasing other colors.

These are thin (not Lulu lemon thin) breathable yoga pants that are fitted through the upper thigh then flair out nicely. I ordered small petite, I am 5.4 130lbs with an inseam 29/30. These fit great and are Incredibly flattering.

Love everything about these. The fabric, the fit, the comfort, the pockets, the quality.  I work in an ER and wear these instead of scrub pants.  Even after dropping a whole pant size (and buying a second pair in a smaller size) the larger size can still be worn with ease.  Best clothing item ever purchased from Amazon.  Will keep buying and wearing again and again.

评论概述: I wear them as dress pants!
评论详情: I wish there was a 29” length for my specifications. But they are still great and it is nice they have different inseams. Front pockets are functional, the lack of back pockets make them less dressy but with the coat I wear at work, no one can tell so I wear them as business casual.

I love these pants, just bought my second pair. Petite is a smidge shorter than I’d like with sneakers or flats, but would be fine for sandals. Regular length is more my style. I love that these easily go from lounge mode to business casual and always look great.
I’m short but these aren’t too long. They are really soft, flattering, and overall a keeper.
Love the snug high waist and the really good pockets, but these are not Sweatpants. they are made of the usual yoga type pants fabric.  I was hoping for something warmer.
Very light weight material and soft too. They are a little long. The color is accurate as shown.

I’m always hesitant buying pants online but these were a win. At 5’2 I ordered the petite and they are the perfect length, loving the high waist and the front pockets make them look a little “formal” than standard yoga pants. Plan to order more in a few more colors .
They are so comfortable. Just wished they came in a true red color also. Loved these so much, I ordered two more pair.
I could wear these every day! The fit is great, tops doesn’t roll and the pockets are deep. I’ll buy again!
These are perfect! Love these! I’m tall & bought a very similar pair from Amazon that were much too short.
I received these yesterday and I’m wearing them today. Very comfortable and good fit. I would buy other colours.
These pants are perfect for lounging or meeting friends for lunch! They are soft and comfortable but are not “workout” looking clothes. Wash well
Perfect for travel, everyday use, or whatever you need. Fabric is lovely, seams in the back are very flattering.

Bought 4 colors because these pants fit my body so well.  Comes up high and fitted at the waist, fitted at hips, then loosens up to wider  legs. Great for girls with little waists and bigger thighs. Stretchy, but thin and flowy legs. My favorite pants
I love these yoga pants. They fit perfectly and they are long enough for once! I am 5’9 and 165 lbs. good quality also.
Pants were a nice weight they were just too long for a petite size.
Nice fabric and seasonal color. The did not fit me well. But they have good reviews by others.

I am 5'10". Most women's pants aren't long enough for me to not look like a dork. I never wear yoga pants because they hug my upper outer thighs and look dorky as well. These pants are both long enough and loose enough around the outer upper thighs to look flattering. I LOVE THESE PANTS!
Hard to believe the price given fabric and fit. Purchased in black and dark navy. Wear them on repeat with everything from sweatshirts & sneakers to cute tops & boots. Versatile bargain!
I’ve never liked yoga pants before but I really like these. They are comfortable and very soft
You can dress it up you can dress it down. Can’t go wrong with them.
These leggings look and feel very high end. The fabric hangs smoothly and doesn’t wrinkle.

评论详情: Love the material fit and the fact that there is a size option for petite and tall. Uncommon in general

I'm proportioned odd!  I have a long torso but short arms and legs.  I cannot buy a long-sleeved shirt or long pants that fit no matter what I do!  I am 5'2" (I'm shrinking with age) and ordered the petite version of my size.  I still had to shorten the length by just over 4"!  I only wear flat shoes (on doctor's orders) so I had taken that into consideration.  With a little help from my husband to mark the length, it took about 2 hours total to raise the hems and now they're fine!I do like the extra gusset in the inside of the legs down the entire length rather than just in the crotch area.  The style is very much like the flare-pants that were popular about 50 years ago (not bell-bottom, just flared).They are comfortable, stretchy and oh, so soft.
The fit is perfect and the front pockets are superb.  Actually look better than my Athletica pants.  Great value for the money.
I wanted a thin stretchy pant and these are perfect. Exactly what I needed.

I've been searching for a long time for a casual, comfortable but not too thin pair of pants. These definitely fill those qualifications. I also like that they are not skin tight through the legs. My only disappointment is that they can get small pulls in the fabric if you're not careful. They seem a little expensive at $35.99, $10 less would be the sweet spot. I will keep looking for an alternative at a lower price also.
Excellent work pants! It looks great with heels or flats and is extremely comfortable!
Seller warned to get a Large not a large petite  - thinking yoga pants would be very long
Most comfortable leggings I've ever owned. Love the flar at bottom
The pants fit real good, best pair I've every ordered
Love the fit and material of these pants.

These fit perfectly and are so comfortable. My only issue was the length.  In the different descriptions, the length actually varies as does the height each length accommodates.  I’m 5’8 1/2” and these are okay barefoot, but when I put on a sandal or athletic shoe, they are too short.  I’ve returned these and ordered a Small Tall.Update:  I ordered two pairs of tall.  One is 32” long,  the other is 33.5” long.  With the regular size, the description shows they are 31” but mine were 30”.  So getting the length you expect is a crap shoot.  Love the pant, but am hesitant to reorder not having consistency with the lengths.

I am totally embracing the wide leg pants. These are so comfortable. They also have side pockets.  I like the high waist and it feels like there is a little compression to them. I have bought two pairs of black and have washed several times and doesn't appear to be piling. I just ordered a dark forest green. Hopefully it is a dark forest green it did not look that dark in the picture

These wide leg yoga pants are so comfortable and wash really well without wrinkles. Check the size guide before ordering.  I’m 5‘3“ and the petite size is perfect. It is 2 inches shorter (inseam is 28”)  than the regular size..

评论概述: Very nice but didn’t work for me

I own these yoga pants in 4 pair of capri length and 1 regular length. For the most part, I LOVE them! That said, I just returned a regular length pair in heather gray--the fabric was totally different than all the other pairs I own--stiff, almost a plasticy texture & smelly. The waist, when compared to the others, was considerably smaller. Also, I own them in the dark coffee (capri length). Fabric is fine but the color is just plain ugly. I kept them anyway they're so comfortable. Clearly, I'm a fan, but these are not inexpensive yoga pants and buyers should be aware that "results vary."
These pants are exactly what I've been looking for.  The material is soft, very flexible and comfortable. I am buying more in other colors.

Just got these today and they are so comfortable. Ultra soft  yet tailored for a really flattering  fit. I am really short,4 ft 10 and curvy got the petite large, the length  is perfect,drapes  beautifully  I can never find wide leg pants that fit me this well. Definitely  buying again.
They fit well and are comfortable. I like the high waist as well.
Fit is great and silky soft pants. Good length. Really can be dressed up or down. Very strange smell upon opening and hope will wash away.
